page.title: 13GENERAL FARMING IN FORD
page.content: Most of the farms in our area are of a mixed type i.e. arable and stock.There is a poultry farm and a pig farm.Dairy herds are common, but sheep are rare.The most common crops are barley,wheat,oats,sugar beet and potatoes.Barley is used for cattle food, bread and malting.Some land is left fallow for rough grazing of the cattle.Crops such as rye grass,peas and general grasses are cropped for silage - for winter feeding of the cattle.The soil is medium loam and quite fertile being in a river valley.
